name: Multi-Device Offline Webpage Viewer
short_description: An Offline Webpage Viewer to be used with multiple devices including PalmOS, PocketPC, Symbian OS, J2ME enabled mobiles and Sun Java supported platforms (etc. Windows,Linux,Unix,MacOS). It uses the Plucker format for saving data. Its code is based on the
